item.description: Yes, this is Saturday of Memorial Day weekend. But with gas prices being what they are, we're planning to celebrate the holiday close to home--and to have a party marking our Meetup's one-year anniversary. We'll have demos and door prizes and a delicious potluck lunch. Long-time members and newbies alike are invited to join us for all the fun. See the Messages section for all the details!
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for Anne! (Clues: Frenzied-looking blonde with funky glasses and a black or khaki apron)
item.why: This is a creative, lively and generous group, willing to share supplies, techniques and information to make sure everyone has a good time.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ Meetup Group May Meetup (Happy 1st Anniversary!)
